full_title: Close To You by Gracie Abrams
title: Close To You

description.plain:
First appearing as a snippet on Instagram in September 2017 and teased again in March 2018, “Close To You” is the second single from Gracie’s sophomore album The Secret Of Us. The final track on the album, Gracie said the song was never meant to be a part of The Secret Of Us, as it was from a different time entirely, but she added the track after years of fans begging for its release.

After performing the song live at an acoustic session in Toronto, “Close To You” was released exclusively on vinyl alongside the album’s lead single, “Risk”, on May 31, 2024. On June 4, Gracie announced it would come to streaming on June 7, 2024.

embed_content: Read “Close To You” by Gracie Abrams on Genius
recording_location: Electric Lady Studios, New York, NY

album.full_title: Track by Track: Gracie Abrams on “The Secret of Us” by Gracie Abrams

body.plain:
First appearing as a snippet on Instagram in September 2017 and teased again in March 2018, “Close To You” is the second single from Gracie’s sophomore album The Secret Of Us. The final track on the album, Gracie said the song was never meant to be a part of The Secret Of Us, as it was from a different time entirely, but she added the track after years of fans begging for its release.

After performing the song live at an acoustic session in Toronto, “Close To You” was released exclusively on vinyl alongside the album’s lead single, “Risk”, on May 31, 2024. On June 4, Gracie announced it would come to streaming on June 7, 2024.
